doctor.name: Dr. Alam Iftekhar Belyat
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Pediatrics), Fellowship in Child Nutrition (USA)
doctor.info: Dr. Alam Iftekhar Belyat is a skilled and compassionate pediatrician in Rajshahi, specializing in newborn care, childhood diseases, and pediatric nutrition. He holds an MBBS, BCS (Health), and MD in Pediatrics, along with a prestigious fellowship in Child Nutrition from the USA. Currently serving as a Consultant in Pediatrics at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital, Dr. Belyat provides expert care for a wide range of conditions including neonatal complications, infections, asthma, allergies, growth and developmental disorders, malnutrition, and vaccination guidance. He is especially known for his expertise in child nutrition and his caring approach to both children and parents. Dr. Belyat sees patients at Rajshahi Royal Hospital Pvt. Ltd., Room 207, Medical College Road, Laxmipur Mor, Rajshahi, from 4:00 PM to 9:00 PM (closed on Fridays). For trusted pediatric care in Rajshahi, Dr. Alam Iftekhar Belyat is a highly recommended choice.
